context: Can you play PS2 games w/ this PS3?
response: No, this PS3 cannot play PS2 games. The PS3 model that allows PS2 back-play essentially has a PS2 inside that allows the back-ward compatibility, making that model MUCH heavier. response: I purchased the same unit for use with a Mac Pro running Mavericks. I use it with AeroFly. i did absolutely nothing to configure and it worked perfectly. All of the buttons were predefined. it works fantastic.

context: does the audio from your television, redirected into this headset once plugged in and setup?
response: No it comes from both but its a simple fix. Just go to the sound settings from the xbox one dashboard and turn HDMI off.

context: Is Pokemon X and y a good entry for someone who has never played any Pokemon game at all but does love to play RPG's?
response: Of course, each game they make is made to introduce new players since there are always new fans to the pokemon franchise. All pokemon games have a tutorial that will help you play the game and understand it. As for the more advance things to learn in Pokemon, it is not needed to enjoy the game and its storyline.

response: 1, 2 or have all 4 hooked up at the same time. It's stated in the description.

context: I downloaded the game COD 4 MW but steam isnt working and i cant get to my game!!!!
response: reinstall and make sure your logged into windows as administrator, make sure your password is correct, make sure your fire wall is allowing all the game process's to communicate, and if you have to, turn user settings to minimum and allow all process's to install.

context: is there a better gaming headphone than this? or this is top of the line?
response: To be honest, I can only answer subjectively, based on my research into the same question. I can say that, coupled with the Soundblaster ZxR, it is by far the best sounding headset I've found.

context: the synk button is not working
response: You have to hold Lt and press the sync button at the same time the to reverse the mod press Rt and press the sync button

context: Just got this cable from Amazon. Fits my 42" vizio nicely. However, the screen colors are skewed and oddly green. Anyone else experiencing this?
response: I would check the pins to see if they are broken. Could be a bad cable also check it with another tv if it works fine with another TV could be the settings for the tv.

context: will i need to buy a built in wifi device for this console?
response: Hi Tanya,Yes if you want to use the Internet you can either plug in an Ethernet cable into the back of the console or you will need to buy the wifi adapter.

context: I wear a really thin pair of headphones when I game, is it a wise idea to get the clip pro over this or will this be fine and comfortable?
response: you certainly can use them, however when you look up the moment trackir cannot see the tracking points it will stop moving. its just a better idea if you got a hat.

context: Is the light bright and should I buy this product?
response: The light is more than just a decorative glow, and I've found it to be a cool and very functional mouse for the price.

context: I have small hands and I'm used to three rows of buttons (nostromo). Are 4 rows doable for most people?
response: I have average sized hands, so my advice might not be very helpful. But I have adjusted the palm rest to be comfortable using the lower three rows of keys, quickly sliding my lower palm onto the top of the palm rest to use the fourth. Therefore, I only ever assign keys I hardly use.

context: This hardrive can be used on the xbox 360 slim console in black.
response: yes, i use it on my slim. The only thing that doesn't work is original Xbox games.

context: I have a 3ds with a small case on it. Would it fit well inside of this carrying case?
response: If you were talking about a regular sized 3ds with a small case... then yes. If you're talking about a 3ds XL then it might be a little tight. There's about an extra 1/4" all the way around on the inside.
